name: Minesweeper 3D (itch)
description:
Project Summary

As a school project, I decided to make a tridimensional Minesweeper. The idea is simple : you have to survive for as long as you can while completing Minesweeper boards, in a 3D world. I released the game after 7 months of development.

Classical Minesweeper

You should not play Minesweeper 3D if you don't know how to play the classical Minesweeper. There are plenty of websites to play the Minesweeper. Here's one of them, if you're interesting in learning it : https://cardgames.io/minesweeper/
